name: Topo
text: Illooooooooooooooooooo

name: TutorialJump
text:
How to jump
 > PC: Space
 > Xbox: A
 > Nintendo: B
 > PlayStation: Cross

name: TutorialOlympicJump
text:
Olympic jump: Crouch and jump while moving in any direction
[1/2]

name: TutorialOlympicJump
text:
How to crouch:
 > PC: Control
 > Xbox: R2
 > Nintendo: ZR
 > PlayStation: R2
[2/2]

name: TutorialLateralJump
text:
Lateral jump: Move in any direction, then move to the oposite direction and jump
[1/2]

name: TutorialLateralJump
text:
Backflip: Crouch and then jump while standing still
[2/2]

name: TutorialGrabScale
text:
Grabbing & dropping items:
 > PC: E
 > Xbox: X
 > Nintendo: Y
 > PlayStation: Square
[1/5]

name: TutorialGrabScale
text:
You can throw items forward:
 > PC: Q
 > Xbox: Y
 > Nintendo: X
 > PlayStation: Triangle
[2/5]

name: TutorialGrabScale
text:
Rescaling items:
 > PC: Left/Right click
 > Xbox: L1/R1
 > Nintendo: L/R
 > PlayStation: L1/R1
[3/5]

name: TutorialGrabScale
text:
You can rescale an item while holding it
[4/5]

name: TutorialGrabScale
text:
Look down to rescale items below you
[5/5]

name: TutorialWalljump
text:
Jump while near a wall to walljump
[1/2]

name: TutorialWalljump
text:
You can hang from corners, jump to climb the corner
[2/2]

name: TutorialBonfire
text: Resting in a bonfire regens your health and respawns enemies

name: TutorialKillingItems
text:
Bomb: Downscale it and throw it to an enemy to make it explode
[1/2]

name: TutorialKillingItems
text:
Bowling ball: Upscale it and throw it to an enemy to stomp it
[2/2]

name: TutorialEnemies1
text: Skeletons must be downscaled before jumping on them
